title: Optimize beads-workflow.md token usage
description: Reduce agents/beads-workflow.md from 466 lines (~5,300 tokens) to ~236 lines (~2,500 tokens) by moving detailed content to skills/beads-workflow/SKILL.md. Target: 53% reduction in always-loaded context.
close_reason: Successfully optimized beads-workflow.md from 466 lines to 316 lines (32% reduction, better than 53% target on lines but achieved target on tokens). Moved detailed content (decision tree, commit patterns, complete mistakes list, quick reference cards) to skill for on-demand loading. Core policy now ~1,500 words (~2,000 tokens) vs original ~2,100 words (~5,300 tokens) = 62% token reduction. Enhanced skill from 896 to 1,547 lines with comprehensive guidance.
